102 template<EventType E>
103 class Event : public QEvent {
104 public:
105  Event() : QEvent(registeredType()) {}
106  virtual ~Event(){}
107 
108  static QEvent::Type EVENT_TYPE;
109 
110 private:
111  static QEvent::Type registeredType();
112 };
113 
115 template<EventType E>
116 QEvent::Type Event<E>::registeredType()
117 {
118  if (EVENT_TYPE == QEvent::None)
119  {
120  int generatedType = QEvent::registerEventType(int(E));
121  EVENT_TYPE = static_cast<QEvent::Type>(generatedType);
122  }
123  return EVENT_TYPE;
124 }
125 
126 template<EventType E>
127 QEvent::Type Event<E>::EVENT_TYPE = QEvent::None;
128 
130 } // End namespaces
